data.title: Thank you to our reviewers
data.meta_description: Training, professional development and best practice for paediatricians & child health professionals. Guideline reviews & clinical lessons. RCPCH CPD endorsed
data.text:
It is impossible to overstate the importance of a robust review process, and we are indebted to our reviewers for the contribution that their views have had on the development of individual manuscripts.
